channel.title: English Grammar and Spelling Homework
channel.description:
I have to check the grammar spelling and punctuation in this, I already did a lot, but there's still more I think. Quote it then color the thing , and then number it and tell me whats wrong. THis is due tomorrow so please look at this today!!! Ty
Once upon a time there was a beautiful princes who lived in the highest tower of her father's castle. She was very lonely one day so, she sent word in a bottle that she wished to escape and threw the message out the window. It fell into the hands of a handsome forester, he read the message. Then he climbed the the high tower, the princess was overjoyed to see him. Together they decided to jump into the moat and swim to safety. They jumped and they were smashed to bits because the moat was empty since it was a dry year. Moral: Look before you leap.

item.title: English Grammar and Spelling Homework
item.dc:creator: @script_owned4 script_owned4
item.description:
@script_owned4 wrote:

Once upon a time, there was a beautiful princess who

lived in the highest tower of her father’s castle.

She was very lonely one day so she sent word in a

bottle that she wished to escape, she then threw the

message out the window. It fell into the hands of a

handsome forester who read the message, he then

climbed the the high tower. The princess was overjoyed

to see him, together they decided to jump into the

moat and swim to safety. They jumped and they were

smashed to bits because the moat was empty since it was a dry

year.

Moral: Look before you leap.

There corrected it, couple mistakes but fixed them for you.

EDIT:xxlegitxx beat me grr…

item.title: English Grammar and Spelling Homework
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Once upon a time, there was this beautiful princess who
Lived in the highest tower of her father’s castle.
She was very lonely one day, so she sent word in a
Bottle that she wished to escape and threw the
Message out the window. It fell into the hands of a
Handsome forester; he read the message. Then when he
Climbed the high tower, the princess was overjoyed
To see him. Together they decided to jump into the
Moat and swim to safety. They jumped and they were
Smashed to bits because the moat was empty since it was a dry
year.

Moral: Look before you leap.

Why did you make new lines in the middle of random sentences? Chopping lines up like that doesn’t make prose into poetry.

Read full topic
